checkHeart.content: My belief that I can be healed: ${number}/100

s0.content: Lord, my son is suffering terribly—please heal him!

s1.content: Jesus, have mercy on me and restore my sight!

s2.content: Master, my body is crippled—can you make me walk again?

s3.content: Heal my daughter, for she is tormented by sickness!

s4.content: Rabbi, my hands are withered—please make them whole!

s5.content: Jesus, my loved one is dying—only You can save them!

s6.content: Son of David, cast out the demons that torment my brother!

s7.content: Lord, my friend is paralyzed—let him rise and walk!

s8.content: Healer, cleanse me of this leprosy and make me pure!

s9.content: Jesus, just say the word, and I know I will be healed!

cutscene.content: As in scripture,Jesus never refused healing for those who seeked him.
